title: The Making of 'Raiders of the lost ark'
brief_description: Using many extracts from the film “Raiders of the lost ark”, and selections from seventy hours of production footage, this documentary covers key aspects of the production of the film, with special emphasis on Spielberg’s use of storyboards in conferences with his art and set designers, performers and crew. Includes interviews with stars Harrison Ford and Karen Allen, Spielberg and stuntman Harry Leonard. Phtographed and edited by Phillip Schuman and narrated by Scott Beach. Suitable for Years 7-12.
